effect.black-white: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.
effect.black-2-white-2: Removes major status effects and confusion from every Pokémon in the user’s party.

short_effect.black-white: Cures the entire party of major status effects.
short_effect.black-2-white-2: Cures the entire party of major status effects.

flavor_text.black-white: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user’s party.
flavor_text.black-2-white-2: The user releases a soothing scent that heals all status problems affecting the user’s party.
